89cae689-73cf-471f-9f1d-332961d6a7bd Westinghouse acquisition completedCameco Corporation and Brookfield Asset Management, alongside its affiliate Brookfield Renewable Partners and institutional partners, now own the company which built the world's first commercial pressurised water reactor more than 60 years ago. Wed, 08 Nov 2023 13:13:53 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Westinghouse-acquisition-completed?feed=feed
7e674b1a-37ea-4941-bedb-441c1efd7980 Collaboration widens for Rolls-Royce SMRs in the NetherlandsDutch construction firm BAM Infra Nederland has agreed to collaborate with ULC-Energy and Rolls-Royce SMR on the deployment of a fleet of Rolls-Royce SMRs in the Netherlands. Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:27:37 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Collaboration-widens-for-Rolls-Royce-SMRs-in-the-N?feed=feed
69440a98-e434-4122-9f72-203145d440e7 Ukraine production planned of used fuel containersEnergoatom and Holtec International are planning to build a plant in Ukraine for the production of containers, which are currently made in the USA, for storage of used nuclear fuel. The two already have joint plans for the construction of a plant in Ukraine to manufacture equipment for Holtec small modular reactors. Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:52:50 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Holtec-to-produce-containers-for-used-fuel-in-Ukra?feed=feed
8520c9c0-0f4a-4072-8721-713d99a10c7b IAEA assesses Kazakh plant site selection processThe International Atomic Energy Agency has concluded a five-day Site and External Events Design mission to Kazakhstan to review the country's process for selecting the site of a planned nuclear power plant. a988e95b-e22a-44c4-b4a5-b3d5aac7b70b Fusion report focuses on future workforce challengesThe UK's Fusion Cluster report <em>发展融合劳动力：未来的挑战和机遇表明，“拥有正确的技能广度和深度至关重要”，并表示该行业必须向其他 STEM 行业学习，解决缺乏多样性等问题。; Tue, 07 Nov 2023 14:42:11 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Fusion-report-focuses-on-future-workforce-challeng?feed=feed

83a3ff15-c91d-4d68-8c50-4259b14af88f Containment shell in place for Chinese SMRThe steel containment dome was successfully hoisted into place at the ACP100 small modular reactor demonstration project at the Changjiang site on China's island province of Hainan, China National Nuclear Corporation has announced. a449f60f-8d9a-431a-b940-caf8b3435076 Planning permission sought for new reactors at RinghalsVattenfall is applying to the municipality of Varberg for a detailed plan to enable the construction of new reactors on the Värö Peninsula, to the west of the existing Ringhals nuclear power plant in Sweden. The announcement came as the government launches a review of the permitting process. Mon, 06 Nov 2023 15:04:53 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Planning-permission-sought-for-new-reactors-at-Rin?feed=feed
